sentences.sContent: As defined from an existentialist perspective, our lives are defined by the choices we make.
sentences.sContent_eng: As defined from an existentialist perspective, our lives are defined by the choices we make.
sentences.sCn: 从存在主义的观点来定义，我们的生活就是我们做出的选择。

words.tran: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物

trans.tranOther: An existentialist is a person who agrees with the philosophy of existentialism
If you describe a person or their philosophy as existentialist, you mean that their beliefs are based on existentialism
